author: Nelson Rosales
about: This project was created in order to try the Star Wars Api.It is a simple app that allows you to search for a character and see their information. It was created using React and Redux.
name: Star Wars App
about-me: My name is Nelson Rosales, and I am a full-stack developer with a freelancer background in Stockholm where I lived 4 years. I am currently living and enjoying my country El Salvador and completing the front-end developer route at Open Bootcamp.
